\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{anyfontsize}
\usepackage{tikz}
\begin{document}
\begin{tikzpicture}[every node/.style={circle, draw=black},sibling distance=3cm]
\node{}
  child{
  node[label={[font=\fontsize{6pt}{8pt}\selectfont]right:\texttt{for(i1=0; i1<n1; i1++)}}]{1}
    child{
    node{3}
    }
  }
  child{
  node{2}
  }
;
\end{tikzpicture}

 \end{document}
